The image of Neil Gorsuch: s Columbia University yearbook entry was posted on Twitter by reporter Laura Rozen, claiming to show a quote by Henry Kissinger.
There was skepticism regarding the authe: as it was believed that the statement attributed to Kissinger was not published until 2013, after the yearbook entry was supposedly made.
Evidence was presented to counter the sk: stating that the quote was publicly available before 2013, appearing in Gary Allen's 1976 book "Kissinger: The Secret Side of the Secretary of State."
Laura Rozen provided additional evidence: including another page from the yearbook showing Gorsuch's fraternity and a zoomed-out image of the full page containing his yearbook quote.
